content: {"name": "Lifelong Learning", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Closed on July 4; Closed 7/9, 8/5, 8/13\nStart date\t6/23/2025\nEnd date\t8/27/2025", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "22 Pearson Road", "address_2": null, "city": "Seabrook", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08302", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.5009989, "longitude": -75.2141168}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 455-8030", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "14:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Meals must be eaten on site."}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Summer Meal Program"}]}
